Articles.Content:
I have recently encountered this issue where i get an immense lag in the VAB. The good exception detector mod reads out:

Throws per second: 5.8 TPS

Unknown

System.Reflection.MonoCMethod.InternalInvoke

(System.Object obj, System.Object[] parameters): 2520

The number at the end keeps on increasing. This started after I installed MKS along with Global Construction and At_Utils mods.

My KSP.log. (google drive link).

Any help at all will be much appreciated.

Warning: The log is long, over 300 mods in there.
